snippet: Chief executives can now feel free to post, blog or tweet — as long as they inform investors about their social media strategy first, Michael J. de la Merced writes in The New York Times.
abstract: Chief executives can now feel free to post, blog or tweet — as long as they inform investors about their social media strategy first, Michael J. de la Merced writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: S.E.C. Sets Rules for Disclosures Using Social Media
